meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of an apocalypse.
meanings.sent1: The dark clouds and eerie silence created an apocalyptical atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: The movie depicted an apocalyptical world where humanity faced extinction.
meanings.sent3: The apocalyptical weather forecast predicted a sudden downpour of frogs.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned city streets were an apocalyptical wasteland of broken dreams.
meanings.sent5: The apocalyptical scene was etched in his mind, haunting him for days.

meanings.definition: Describing a catastrophic event or situation.
meanings.sent1: The earthquake left behind an apocalyptical scene of destruction.
meanings.sent2: The apocalyptical aftermath of the hurricane was devastating.
meanings.sent3: The apocalyptical traffic jam caused chaos on the streets.
meanings.sent4: The apocalyptical news of the stock market crash spread quickly.
meanings.sent5: The apocalyptical impact of the explosion was felt for miles around.

meanings.definition: Portending imminent disaster or final doom.
meanings.sent1: The sudden drop in temperature was an apocalyptical sign of the coming storm.
meanings.sent2: The apocalyptical warning sirens blared, signaling danger ahead.
meanings.sent3: The apocalyptical prediction of a zombie apocalypse made everyone laugh nervously.
meanings.sent4: The apocalyptical silence in the room foretold a looming confrontation.
meanings.sent5: The apocalyptical prophecy of the old wise woman haunted the villagers.
